009package imagingbook.common.geometry.fitting.ellipse.geometric;
010
011import static imagingbook.common.math.Arithmetic.isZero;
012import static imagingbook.common.math.Arithmetic.sqr;
013import static imagingbook.common.math.Matrix.makeRealMatrix;
014import static imagingbook.common.math.Matrix.subtract;
015import static java.lang.Math.cos;
016import static java.lang.Math.signum;
017import static java.lang.Math.sin;
018import static java.lang.Math.sqrt;
019import static org.apache.commons.math3.fitting.leastsquares.LeastSquaresFactory.evaluationChecker;
020
021import java.util.ArrayList;
022import java.util.List;
023
024import org.apache.commons.math3.fitting.leastsquares.LeastSquaresFactory;
025import org.apache.commons.math3.fitting.leastsquares.LeastSquaresOptimizer.Optimum;
026import org.apache.commons.math3.fitting.leastsquares.LeastSquaresProblem;
027import org.apache.commons.math3.fitting.leastsquares.LevenbergMarquardtOptimizer;
028import org.apache.commons.math3.fitting.leastsquares.MultivariateJacobianFunction;
029import org.apache.commons.math3.linear.Array2DRowRealMatrix;
030import org.apache.commons.math3.linear.ArrayRealVector;
031import org.apache.commons.math3.linear.RealMatrix;
032import org.apache.commons.math3.linear.RealVector;
033import org.apache.commons.math3.optim.SimpleVectorValueChecker;
034import org.apache.commons.math3.util.Pair;
035
036import imagingbook.common.geometry.basic.Pnt2d;
037import imagingbook.common.geometry.ellipse.GeometricEllipse;
038import imagingbook.common.geometry.fitting.ellipse.algebraic.EllipseFitAlgebraic;
039import imagingbook.common.geometry.fitting.ellipse.algebraic.EllipseFitFitzgibbonStable;
040import imagingbook.common.geometry.fitting.ellipse.utils.EllipseSampler;
041import imagingbook.common.ij.DialogUtils.DialogLabel;
042import imagingbook.common.math.Matrix;
043import imagingbook.common.math.PrintPrecision;
044import imagingbook.common.util.ParameterBundle;
045
046
047/**
048 * "Distance-based" geometric ellipse fitter using iterative minimization with
049 * the Levenberg-Marquart method.
050 * 
051 * @author WB
052 *
053 */
054public class EllipseGeometricFitDist extends EllipseFitGeometric {
055        
056        private final Pnt2d[] pts;
057        private final double tolerance;
058        private final int maxEvaluations;
059        private final int maxIterations;
060        
061        private final double[] V;
062        private final double[][] J;
063        
064        private final MultivariateJacobianFunction model;
065        private final Optimum solution;
066        private final List<double[]> history = new ArrayList<>();
067        
068        public EllipseGeometricFitDist(Pnt2d[] pts, GeometricEllipse initEllipse, int maxEvaluations, 
069                        int maxIterations, double tolerance, boolean syntheticDeriv) {
070                this.pts = pts;
071                int n = pts.length;
072                this.V = new double[n];
073                this.J = new double[n][5];
074                this.maxEvaluations = maxEvaluations;
075                this.maxIterations = maxIterations;
076                this.tolerance = tolerance;
077                this.model = (syntheticDeriv) ? new SyntheticModel() : new AnalyticModel();
078                this.solution = solveLM(initEllipse.getParameters());
079        }
080        
081        public EllipseGeometricFitDist(Pnt2d[] pts, GeometricEllipse initEllipse) {
082                this(pts, initEllipse, DefaultMaxIterations, DefaultMaxIterations, DefaultTolerance, false);
083        }
084        
085        // --------------------------------------------------------------------------
086        
087        @Override
088        public double[] getParameters() {
089                return solution.getPoint().toArray();
090        }
091        
092        @Override
093        public int getIterations() {
094                return solution.getIterations();
095        }
096        
097        @Override
098        public List<double[]> getHistory() {
099                return this.history;
100        }
101        
102        // --------------------------------------------------------------------------
103
104        private Optimum solveLM(double[] p0) {
105                LeastSquaresProblem problem = LeastSquaresFactory.create(
106                                this.model,
107                                new ArrayRealVector(pts.length),        // zero vector
108                                new ArrayRealVector(p0),
109                                evaluationChecker(new SimpleVectorValueChecker(tolerance, tolerance)), 
110                                maxEvaluations, maxIterations);
111
112                LevenbergMarquardtOptimizer optimizer = new LevenbergMarquardtOptimizer();
113                Optimum sol = optimizer.optimize(problem);
114                return sol;
115        }
116        
117        // --------------------------------------------------------------------------
118        
119        class AnalyticModel implements MultivariateJacobianFunction {
120        
121                @Override
122                public Pair<RealVector, RealMatrix> value(RealVector point) {
123                        final double[] p = point.toArray();
124                        if (RecordHistory) {
125                                history.add(p.clone());
126                        }
127                        final GeometricEllipse ellipse = new GeometricEllipse(p);
128                        final double ra = ellipse.ra;
129                        final double rb = ellipse.rb;
130                        final double xc = ellipse.xc;
131                        final double yc = ellipse.yc;
132                        final double theta = ellipse.theta;
133                        final double ra2 = sqr(ra);
134                        final double rb2 = sqr(rb);
135                        final double[] xyc = new double[] {xc, yc};
136                        
137                        RealMatrix R = makeRealMatrix(2, 2,
138                                        cos(theta), -sin(theta), 
139                                        sin(theta),  cos(theta));
140                        RealMatrix Rt = R.transpose();
141                        
142                        // calculate values and Jacobian
143                        for (int i = 0; i < pts.length; i++) {
144                                Pnt2d XY = pts[i];
145                                Pnt2d XYp = ellipse.getClosestPoint(XY);
146                                double d = XYp.distance(XY);
147                                V[i] = d;
148                                
149                                double[] xy = XY.toDoubleArray();
150                                double x = xy[0], y = xy[1];
151                                double[] uv = Rt.operate(subtract(xy, xyc));                                    // target point in canon. coordinates
152                                double u = uv[0],  v = uv[1];                                                                   // = (u_i, v_i)
153
154                                double[] xyp = XYp.toDoubleArray();                                                             // ellipse point closest to Xi
155                                double xp = xyp[0], yp = xyp[1];                                                                // = (\breve{x}_i, \breve{y}_i)
156
157                                double[] uvp = Rt.operate(subtract(xyp, xyc));                                  // closest point in canon. coordinates
158                                double up = uvp[0], vp = uvp[1];                                                                // = (\breve{u}_i, \breve{u}_i) 
159                                
160                                double gA = signum((u - up) * up / ra2 + (v - vp) * vp / rb2);
161                                double gB = sqrt(sqr(up / ra2) + sqr(vp / rb2));
162                                if (isZero(gB)) {
163                                        throw new RuntimeException("gB is zero!");
164                                }
165                                double g = gA / gB;
166                                
167                                J[i][0] = -g * sqr(up) / (ra2 * ra);
168                                J[i][1] = -g * sqr(vp) / (rb2 * rb);
169                                if (!isZero(d)) {
170                                        J[i][2] = (xp - x) / d;
171                                        J[i][3] = (yp - y) / d;
172                                        J[i][4] = ((y - yp) * (xc - xp) - (x - xp) * (yc - yp)) / d ;
173                                }
174                                else {
175                                        J[i][2] = J[i][3] = J[i][4] = 0;
176                                }
177                        }
178                        
179                        RealVector VV = new ArrayRealVector(V, false);
180                        RealMatrix JJ = new Array2DRowRealMatrix(J, false);
181                        return new Pair<>(VV, JJ);
182                }
183        }
184        
185        // --------------------------------
186        
187        class SyntheticModel implements MultivariateJacobianFunction {
188                
189                final double delta = 0.00001;
190
191                @Override
192                public Pair<RealVector, RealMatrix> value(RealVector point) {
193                        double[] p = point.toArray();
194                        if (RecordHistory) {
195                                history.add(p.clone());
196                        }
197                        GeometricEllipse ellipse = new GeometricEllipse(p);             // ellipse for current parameter point
198                        GeometricEllipse[] dEllipses = new GeometricEllipse[5]; // differentially modified ellipses
199                        for (int j = 0; j < 5; j++) {
200                                double[] pd = p.clone();
201                                pd[j] = p[j] + delta;
202                                dEllipses[j] = new GeometricEllipse(pd);
203                        }
204                        
205                        // calculate values and Jacobian
206                        for (int i = 0; i < pts.length; i++) {
207                                Pnt2d XYi = pts[i];
208                                Pnt2d XYp = ellipse.getClosestPoint(XYi);
209                                double di = XYp.distance(XYi);
210                                V[i] = di;                                                              // value = distance of point to ellipse
211                                
212                                for (int j = 0; j < 5; j++) {
213                                        Pnt2d XYpj = dEllipses[j].getClosestPoint(XYi);
214                                        J[i][j] = (XYpj.distance(XYi) - di) / delta;    // estimated partial derivative
215                                }
216                        }
217                        
218                        RealVector VV = new ArrayRealVector(V, false);
219                        RealMatrix JJ = new Array2DRowRealMatrix(J, false);
220                        return new Pair<>(VV, JJ);
221                }
222        }
223    
224    // -------------------------------------------------------------------
225

271        
272        // -------------------------------------------------------------------
273        // -------------------------------------------------------------------
274        
275        public static class Parameters implements ParameterBundle {
276                
277                @DialogLabel("number of points")
278                public int n = 20;
279                
280                @DialogLabel("ellipse center (xc)")
281                public double xc = 200;
282                
283                @DialogLabel("ellipsecenter (yc)")
284                public double yc = 190;
285                
286                @DialogLabel("major axis radius (ra)")
287                public double ra = 170;
288                
289                @DialogLabel("minor axis radius (rb)")
290                public double rb = 120;
291                
292                @DialogLabel("start angle (deg)")
293                public double angle0 = 0;
294                
295                @DialogLabel("stop angle (deg)")
296                public double angle1 = 180; // was Math.PI/4;
297                
298                @DialogLabel("ellipse orientation (deg)")
299                public double theta = 45;
300                
301                @DialogLabel("x/y noise (sigma)")
302                public double sigma = 5.0; //2.0;
303        };
304        
305        private static Parameters params = new Parameters();
306        
307      
308    public static void main(String[] args) {
309        
310        System.out.println("*** Testing "  + EllipseGeometricFitDist.class.getSimpleName() + " ***");
311        PrintPrecision.set(9);
312        
313        GeometricEllipse realEllipse = new GeometricEllipse(params.ra, params.rb, params.xc, params.yc, 
314                                Math.toRadians(params.theta));
315        
316        EllipseSampler sampler = new EllipseSampler(realEllipse, 17);
317        
318        Pnt2d[] points = sampler.getPoints(params.n, 
319                                Math.toRadians(params.angle0), Math.toRadians(params.angle1), params.sigma);
320        
321//      Pnt2d[] points = null;
322        //Pnt2d[] points = CircleMaker.makeTestCircle(XC, YC, R, 100, Angle0, Angle1, SigmaNoise);
323        //Pnt2d[] points = CircleMaker.makeTestCircle(XC, YC, R, 4, Angle0, Angle1, 0.1);
324        //Pnt2d[] points = CircleSampler.makeTestGander(30);
325        //Pnt2d[] points = CircleSampler.make3Points(30);
326                
327        EllipseFitAlgebraic fitA = new EllipseFitFitzgibbonStable(points);
328        
329        GeometricEllipse ellipseA = new GeometricEllipse(fitA.getEllipse());
330        System.out.println("ellipseA = " + ellipseA);
331        System.out.println("errorA = " + ellipseA.getMeanSquareError(points));
332                
333        EllipseGeometricFitDist fitG = new EllipseGeometricFitDist(points, ellipseA);
334        GeometricEllipse ellipseG = fitG.getEllipse();
335        System.out.println("ellipseG = " + ellipseG);
336        System.out.println("errorG = " + ellipseG.getMeanSquareError(points));
337        System.out.println("iterations = " + fitG.getIterations());
338        
339        for (double[] p : fitG.getHistory()) {
340                System.out.println("   " + Matrix.toString(p));
341        }
342        
343        // check analytic/synthetic Jacobians:
344        GeometricEllipse eTest = new GeometricEllipse (100, 120, 50, -30, 0.25);
345        Pnt2d xi = Pnt2d.from(110, -70);
346        Pnt2d[] pts = {xi};
347        
348        {
349                EllipseGeometricFitDist fit = new EllipseGeometricFitDist(pts, ellipseA);
350                MultivariateJacobianFunction model = fit.new AnalyticModel();
351                Pair<RealVector, RealMatrix> result = model.value(Matrix.makeRealVector(eTest.getParameters()));
352                RealMatrix J = result.getSecond();
353                System.out.println("J analytic = \n" + Matrix.toString(J.getData()));
354        }
355        
356        {
357                EllipseGeometricFitDist fit = new EllipseGeometricFitDist(pts, ellipseA);
358                MultivariateJacobianFunction model = fit.new SyntheticModel();
359                Pair<RealVector, RealMatrix> result = model.value(Matrix.makeRealVector(eTest.getParameters()));
360                RealMatrix J = result.getSecond();
361                System.out.println("J synthetic = \n" + Matrix.toString(J.getData()));
362        }
363    }
364
365}
